lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Louis Bell/Austin Post/Adam Feeney/Billy Walsh/Kaan Gunesberk
[00:01.000] 作曲 : Louis Bell/Austin Post/Adam Feeney/Billy Walsh/Kaan Gunesberk
[00:17.41]Oh, oh, oh-oh
[00:21.91]Oh, oh, oh-oh
[00:26.45]Oh, oh, oh-oh, oh-oh, oh-oh
[00:33.60]We couldn't turn around
[00:37.87]'Til we were upside down
[00:41.96]I'll be the bad guy now
[00:45.90]But no, I ain't too proud
[00:50.20]I couldn't be there
[00:53.64]Even when I try
[00:58.24]You don't believe it
[01:01.52]We do this every time
[01:04.32]Seasons change and our love went cold
[01:07.89]Feed the flame 'cause we can't let it go
[01:12.27]Run away, but we're running in circles
[01:16.34]Run away, run away
[01:18.90]I dare you to do something
[01:22.49]I'm waiting on you again, so I don't take the blame
[01:28.34]Run away, but we're running in circles
[01:32.34]Run away, run away, run away
[01:35.98]Let go
[01:37.69]I got a feeling that it's time to let it go
[01:42.34]I say so
[01:46.01]I knew that this was doomed from the get-go
[01:50.50]You thought that it was special, special
[01:54.61]But it was just the sex though, the sex though
[01:58.48]And I still hear the echoes (The echoes)
[02:02.44]I got a feeling that it's time to let it go, let it go
[02:07.50]Seasons change and our love went cold
[02:11.94]Feed the flame 'cause we can't let it go
[02:16.15]Run away, but we're running in circles
[02:20.17]Run away, run away
[02:22.93]I dare you to do something
[02:26.45]I'm waiting on you again, so I don't take the blame
[02:32.33]Run away, but we're running in circles
[02:36.09]Run away, run away, run away
[02:40.01]Maybe you don't understand what I'm going through
[02:44.40]It's only me, what you got to lose?
[02:48.34]Make up your mind, tell me, what are you gonna do?
[02:52.20]It's only me, let it go
[02:55.82]Seasons change and our love went cold
[03:00.02]Feed the flame 'cause we can't let it go
[03:04.04]Run away, but we're running in circles
[03:08.17]Run away, run away
[03:11.00]I dare you to do something
[03:14.44]I'm waiting on you again, so I don't take the blame
[03:20.36]Run away, but we're running in circles
[03:24.09]Run away, run away, run away
tlyric:
[by:Trap_Girl]
[00:17.41]
[00:21.91]
[00:26.45]
[00:33.60]我们难以回头
[00:37.87]除非直接翻转一切
[00:41.96]我现在变成负心人
[00:45.90]我却并不为此骄傲
[00:50.20]我无法来到你身边
[00:53.64]即使我奋力尝试
[00:58.24]你不愿相信我
[01:01.52]剧情便总是这样上演
[01:04.32]时过境迁 爱意已经冷却
[01:07.89]火上浇油 因为不愿放手
[01:12.27]奋力逃离 却跑进了感情怪圈
[01:16.34]奋力逃离 奋力逃离
[01:18.90]我敢说 你还会有所行动
[01:22.49]我就在原地等你 所以别让我承担罪责
[01:28.34]奋力逃离 却跑进了感情怪圈
[01:32.34]奋力逃离 奋力逃离
[01:35.98]放手
[01:37.69]我知道是时候该放手了
[01:42.34]我真的能这样说出口
[01:46.01]这一切 我想从一开始就是错
[01:50.50]在你眼中这段感情不同以往
[01:54.61]而我看来这不过是欢爱一场
[01:58.48]我依旧可以听到你的回音
[02:02.44]我知道是时候应该放弃你
[02:07.50]时过境迁 爱意已经冷却

[02:26.45]我就在原地等你 所以别让我承担罪责
[02:32.33]奋力逃离 却跑进了感情怪圈
[02:36.09]奋力逃离 奋力逃离
[02:40.01]也许你并不清楚我的过往
[02:44.40]我一直形单影只 你又失去了什么
[02:48.34]定下决心 告诉我你要怎么做
[02:52.20]我一直形单影只 所以我任你远走
